actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the federal cigarette labeling and advertising act to require the federal trade commission to establish acceptable levels of tar and nicotine content of cigarettes.

summary.text: Low Tar and Nicotine Act - Provides, under the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act, that the Federal Trade Commission shall establish acceptable levels of tar and nicotine content for cigarettes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the federal cigarette labeling and advertising act to require the federal trade commission to establish acceptable levels of tar and nicotine content of cigarettes.
